title: 旧约 - 历代记上(1 Chronicles) - 第 1 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 历代记上(1 Chronicles) -- 第 1 章 ( 本篇共有 29 章 )

lineList.en: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
lineList.cn: 亚当生塞特。塞特生以挪士。

lineList.en: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
lineList.cn: 以挪士生该南。该南生玛勒列。玛勒列生雅列。

lineList.en: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
lineList.cn: 雅列生以诺。以诺生玛土撒拉。玛土撒拉生拉麦。

lineList.en: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
lineList.cn: 拉麦生挪亚。挪亚生闪，含，雅弗。

lineList.en: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
lineList.cn: 雅弗的儿子是歌篾，玛各，玛代，雅完，土巴，米设，提拉。

lineList.en: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
lineList.cn: 歌篾的儿子是亚实基拿，低法（低法创世记十章三节是利法），陀迦玛。

lineList.en: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
lineList.cn: 雅完的儿子是以利沙，他施，基提，多单（多单有作罗单的）。

lineList.en: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
lineList.cn: 含的儿子是古实，麦西，弗，迦南。

lineList.en: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
lineList.cn: 古实的儿子是西巴，哈腓拉，撒弗他，拉玛，撒弗提迦。拉玛的儿子是示巴，底但。

lineList.en: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
lineList.cn: 古实生宁录。他为世上英雄之首。

lineList.en: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
lineList.cn: 麦西生路低人，亚拿米人，利哈比人，拿弗土希人，

lineList.en: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
lineList.cn: 帕斯鲁细人，迦斯路希人，迦斐托人。从迦斐托出来的有非利士人。

lineList.en: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
lineList.cn: 迦南生长子西顿，又生赫

lineList.en: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
lineList.cn: 和耶布斯人，亚摩利人，革迦撒人，

lineList.en: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
lineList.cn: 希未人，亚基人，西尼人，

lineList.en: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
lineList.cn: 亚瓦底人，洗玛利人，并哈马人。

lineList.en: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
lineList.cn: 闪的儿子是以拦，亚述，亚法撒，路德，亚兰，乌斯，户勒，基帖，米设（米设创世记十章二十三节作玛施）。

lineList.en: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
lineList.cn: 亚法撒生沙拉。沙拉生希伯。

lineList.en: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.
lineList.cn: 希伯生了两个儿子，一个名叫法勒（法勒就是分的意思），因为那时人就分地居住。法勒的兄弟名叫约坍。

lineList.en: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
lineList.cn: 约坍生亚摩答，沙列，哈萨玛非，耶拉，

lineList.en: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
lineList.cn: 哈多兰，乌萨，德拉，

lineList.en: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
lineList.cn: 以巴录，亚比玛利，示巴，

lineList.en: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
lineList.cn: 阿斐，哈腓拉，约巴。这都是约坍的儿子。

lineList.en: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
lineList.cn: 闪生亚法撒。亚法撒生沙拉。

lineList.en: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
lineList.cn: 沙拉生希伯。希伯生法勒。法勒生拉吴。

lineList.en: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
lineList.cn: 拉吴生西鹿。西鹿生拿鹤。拿鹤生他拉。

lineList.en: Abram; the same is Abraham.
lineList.cn: 他拉生亚伯兰，亚伯兰就是亚伯拉罕。

lineList.en: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕的儿子是以撒，以实玛利。

lineList.en: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
lineList.cn: 以实玛利的儿子记在下面，以实玛利的长子是尼拜约，其次是基达，押德别，米比衫，

lineList.en: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
lineList.cn: 米施玛，度玛，玛撒，哈达，提玛，

lineList.en: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
lineList.cn: 伊突，拿非施，基底玛。这都是以实玛利的儿子。

lineList.en: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕的妾基土拉所生的儿子，就是心兰，约珊，米但，米甸，伊施巴，书亚。约珊的儿子是示巴，底但。

lineList.en: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
lineList.cn: 米甸的儿子是以法，以弗，哈诺，亚比大，以勒大。这都是基土拉的子孙。

lineList.en: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
lineList.cn: 亚伯拉罕生以撒。以撒的儿子是以扫和以色列。

lineList.en: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
lineList.cn: 以扫的儿子是以利法，流珥，耶乌施，雅兰，可拉。

lineList.en: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
lineList.cn: 以利法的儿子是毯螅，阿抹，洗玻，迦坦，基纳斯，亭纳，亚玛力。

lineList.en: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
lineList.cn: 流珥的儿子是拿哈，谢拉，沙玛，米撒。

lineList.en: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezar, and Dishan.
lineList.cn: 西珥的儿子是罗坍，朔巴，祭便，亚拿，底顺，以察，底珊。

lineList.en: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.
lineList.cn: 罗坍的儿子是何利，荷幔。罗坍的妹子是亭纳。

lineList.en: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
lineList.cn: 朔巴的儿子是亚勒文，玛拿辖，以巴录，示非，阿南。祭便的儿子是亚雅，亚拿。

lineList.en: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
lineList.cn: 亚拿的儿子是底顺。底顺的儿子是哈默兰，伊是班，益兰，基兰。

lineList.en: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
lineList.cn: 以察的儿子是辟罕，撒番，亚干。底珊的儿子是乌斯，亚兰。

lineList.en: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
lineList.cn: 以色列人未有君王治理之先，在以东地作王的记在下面，有比珥的儿子比拉，他的京城名叫亭哈巴。

lineList.en: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
lineList.cn: 比拉死了，波斯拉人谢拉的儿子约巴接续他作王。

lineList.en: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
lineList.cn: 约巴死了，毯螅地的人户珊接续他作王。

lineList.en: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
lineList.cn: 户珊死了，比达的儿子哈达接续他作王。这哈达就是在摩押地杀败米甸人的，他的京城名叫亚未得。

lineList.en: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
lineList.cn: 哈达死了，玛士利加人桑拉接续他作王。

lineList.en: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
lineList.cn: 桑拉死了，大河边的利河伯人扫罗接续他作王。

lineList.en: And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
lineList.cn: 扫罗死了，亚革波的儿子巴勒哈南接续他作王。

lineList.en: And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
lineList.cn: 巴勒哈南死了，哈达接续他作王。他的京城名叫巴伊，他的妻子名叫米希她别，是米萨合的孙女，玛特列的女儿。

lineList.en: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
lineList.cn: 哈达死了，以东人的族长有亭纳族长，亚勒瓦族长，耶帖族长，

lineList.en: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
lineList.cn: 亚何利巴玛族长，以拉族长，比嫩族长，

lineList.en: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
lineList.cn: 基纳斯族长，毯螅族长，米比萨族长，

lineList.en: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
lineList.cn: 玛基叠族长，以兰族长。这都是以东人的族长。
